item.description:
This month, Peter Melencio will be presenting his concerns and issues involving his company, American Nurse Exchange. He will provide us with a background of his current situation and what he hopes to accomplish for 2008.
The other members of the group will provide him with feedback and recommendations to help him develop programs and processes to address his concerns and issues.
The meeting is confidential and all disclosures therein are meant solely for the use of the participants and should not be shared outside of the group without the express consent and permission of the presenter.
All participants agree to maintain the strict confidentiality of any proprietary information that may be disclosed by members to the group.
Thank you very much.
item.name: Focus on Peter Melencio's Goals and Issues
